name: Aviva
reviews: The Filipinos seem to be dazzled by how this two-wheeler performs and appears. Now the reason why I bought this vehicle was the clarity in its claims of power and performance. It gets a no-nonsense look on its face which is true to its inputs that seem to be a little borrowed from its predecessors.

name: Hallie
reviews: If you haven't ever come across a beast with limited power output, I suggest you watch out for the Kawasaki Ninja ZX25R. Starting right from a track-oriented look to its green and black color setting, the Ninja dawns the perfect Ninja attire. Interestingly, the bike is no less than a ninja

name: Albina
reviews: Every biker dream of owning a Ninja but not many can afford it. The price is too high. But riding a Ninja is something that can’t be explained in words. This bike looks bigger and more massive than the Ninja 250. The Ninja ZX-25R has a commanding road presence. It has all-round handsome looks.

name: Novelia
reviews: Whichever way you look at it, the Kawasaki Ninja ZX 25R is extremely handsome. It’s the smallest capacity bike in the Ninja lineup, coming with a 250cc engine. But if you want to turn heads on the street, then bet on the Ninja ZX 25R to do the job. Riding the Ninja was a dream come true

name: Amara
reviews: The Kawasaki Ninja ZX 25R is the best-looking bike I have ever seen in the market. Its appearance was one of the main reasons I couldn't stop myself from getting this bike.

name: Dela
reviews: The Kawasaki Ninja ZX 25R is perfectly suited for the streets of the Philippines. Being one of the compact offerings in the brand, the ZX 25R does a commendable job at carrying over the practicality of the bigger variants of the lot.

name: Esra
reviews: The Ninja ZX25R is an absolute beauty in terms of design. The aggressive front end of this bike is bound to make a lot of heads turn in its appreciation.

name: Enos
reviews: Recently I got a chance to ride the Ninja ZX25R from Kawasaki and I must say that I was quite impressed with the overall performance of this bike. I loved the design of this bike as it is very sharp and has a lot of aggressive elements to it
